description: Steamship's default trainable text generation, capable of fine-tuning and deploying trained text generation with no infrastructure management on your part.
author: Steamship

openai_api_key.description: An openAI API key to use. If left default, will use Steamship's API key.

max_words.description: The maximum number of words to generate per request

temperature.description: Controls randomness. Lower values produce higher likelihood / more predictable results; higher values produce more variety. Values between 0-1.

tag_kind.description: The tag_kind to use for training examples. The block text referenced by the tag will be used as the prompt; the string_value of the tag value will be used as the completion.

num_completions.description: The number of returned completion alternatives per request

steamshipRegistry.tagline: Train and use text generation with OpenAI's GPT3.
steamshipRegistry.tagline2: Just specify which tags in Steamship to train on, then generate more of the same.
steamshipRegistry.usefulFor: Useful for generating text in a specific style when training data is available.
